EmailTemplate.description: NOTE: This template should ONLY be used to respond back to an external Customer. If you’re responding back to an INTERNAL Honeywell resource only (ex. Customer Business Manager, Customer Business Team, Salesperson, Product Line Leader, etc) use the Template INTERNAL only initial response - Order Schedule Line Push-Out Request Outside of Policy.
EmailTemplate.name: Order Cancellation Request – Request due to past due order, excessive lead times
EmailTemplate.subject: Order Cancellation Request {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This cancellation request falls outside the order change window of 7 calendar days from order placement. Because you are cancelling due to a potential delivery performance issue on Honeywell’s part, this request will be routed to our business team for further review.
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} PO Number: <Enter Customer PO#> Sales Order Number: <Enter SAP SO#>
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
